changeSet.comment: fill in the table "user_role_links" with test data
changeSet.sql: WITH series AS (SELECT GENERATE_SERIES(1, 1000) sery) INSERT INTO user_role_links (active, user_id, role_id, inserted_date_at_utc) SELECT CASE WHEN s.sery % 10 = 0 THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END, FLOOR(RANDOM() * ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USERS) - 1) + 1), FLOOR(RANDOM() * ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ROLES) - 1) + 1), NOW() - FLOOR((RANDOM() * (1000 - 500) + 500)) * INTERVAL '1 day' FROM series s ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING
